3.content: Tesla's revenue in 2022 was nearly $81.5 billion, which represents a 51 percent increase from the previous year. The majority of the revenue, over $71 billion, was generated from Tesla's automotive segment. The Model Y emerged as Tesla's best-selling vehicle, and the company has been investing in the production of the Model 3 and Model Y.
